message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today. I think it would be perfect for your needs and I'm happy to answer any questions you have. I'm asking for $15,000 for it. What do you think?
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While $12,000 is a bit lower than I was hoping for, I'm willing to negotiate. Could you meet me halfway at $13,500?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $12,500?
